review_data.title: Great coffee and ambience
review_data.content: This is a traditional coffee house with great coffee. Lots of tasty pastries and cakes. It has a welcoming and cosy ambiance. Well worth a visit.

review_data.title: Tolles Quartiercafe
review_data.content: Sehr sympathisches Quartiercafe mit gutem Essen, riesiger Auswahl Zeitungen und super Preis-/Leistungsverhältnis.

review_data.title: Been around for ever with good reason
review_data.content: This place has been here some 30 years. Plenty of indoor and outdoor seating. Very attentive and prompt service Beware though, 1 coffee is CHF 4.80, possibly a little pricier than other places in the city.

review_data.title: Très bon
review_data.content: Le Café Restaurant Muhlebach est très bien situé dans Zurich. Très bon accueil et cuisine savoureuse!

review_data.title: Busy corner, neighborhood Cafe
